SEARCH
Package view.gui

Class GameData

java.lang.Object
view.gui.GameData
public class GameData extends Object
This class contains all the data needed to update the GUI. It is used by the GUI to update the view.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameData

      public GameData(GameInfo data, String me)
      This constructor is used to create the GameData object when the game starts.
      Parameters:
      data - contains all the data needed to create the GameData object.
      me - is the name of the player using the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Update update)
      This method is used to update the GameData object. It updates the shelves of the players, the tabletop and the common objectives.
      Parameters:
      update - contains all the data needed to update the GameData object.

    • updateTableTop

      private void updateTableTop(Card[][] tableTop)
      This method is used to update the tableTop.
      Parameters:
      tableTop - is the new tableTop.
